author: Madeline Farber
title: 2 New Jersey coronavirus patients recovering after plasma treatment, hospital says
description: The first two coronavirus patients in New Jersey to undergo experimental plasma treatments are now recovering from the virus, according to the hospital where they are being treated.
content:
